abstract: Billionaire businessman Ronald O Perelman files notice with Securities and Exchange Commission that infers search for sale of Revlon, cosmetic company he has controlled through his investment firm for more than two decades.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; As Revlon’s Profit Falls, Perelman Hints at a Sale
headline.main: Ronald Perelman to Explore ‘Strategic Alternatives’ for Revlon

snippet: Mr. Perelman’s investment firm said that it expected “to communicate with third parties” about a potential transaction, but has not formulated a plan.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Perelman’s investment firm said that it expected “to communicate with third parties” about a potential transaction, but has not formulated a plan.
